first_para: James Stephen Wharton (born 16 February 1984) is a British Conservative Party politician. He has been the Member of Parliament of his home constituency of Stockton South since the 2010 general election, having defeated the sitting Labour MP Dari Taylor by 332 votes.

full.extract: James Stephen Wharton (born 16 February 1984) is a British Conservative Party politician. He has been the Member of Parliament of his home constituency of Stockton South since the 2010 general election, having defeated the sitting Labour MP Dari Taylor by 332 votes.
full.title: James Wharton
